5.text: Hussain and Kaveen are Grade 8 students at Kannangara Maha Vidyalaya. Kaveen was absent one day and Hussain called him to inform him about the programme for their annual trip to Kandy.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Hussain and Kaveen are Grade 8 students at Kannangara Maha Vidyalaya. Kaveen was absent one day and Hussain called him to inform him about the programme for their annual trip to Kandy.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Hussain: Hello! Can I speak to Kaveen please?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Hussain: Hello! Can I speak to Kaveen please?</prosody></speak>

7.text: Kaveen: Hello Hussain! I was not feeling well in the morn- ing. That's why I was absent today.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Kaveen: Hello Hussain! I was not feeling well in the morn- ing. That's why I was absent today.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Hussain: Oh! How are you feeling now?
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Hussain: Oh! How are you feeling now?</prosody></speak>

10.text: Hussain: That's great! By the way, you'll be joining us on the trip, won't you?
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Hussain: That's great! By the way, you'll be joining us on the trip, won't you?</prosody></speak>

11.text: Kaveen: Why not? I'm all set to go on the trip. Did you get the itinerary?
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Kaveen: Why not? I'm all set to go on the trip. Did you get the itinerary?</prosody></speak>

12.text: Hussain: Yes. The bus will leave the school premises at 5.30 in the morning. We were asked to come half an hour early.
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Hussain: Yes. The bus will leave the school premises at 5.30 in the morning. We were asked to come half an hour early.</prosody></speak>
